title: M-Theory: A Marauders Short Story
description: M-Theory: This theory combines the five different string theories into one. It states that strings are really 1-dimensional slices of a 2-dimensional membrane vibrating in 11-dimensional space and that the five different versions of string theory might describe the same thing seen from different perspectives.In plain text: it's a fucking mystery.This is a short story that can be found on the Freak Circle Press blog.http://freakcirclepress.com/2014/02/2...
author: Lina Andersson
